author: Wayne Holmes
comment: Nice
Loved this watch face on my old Moto 360 but it doesn't show up in the app store on my new Zen Watch 3, none of the watch faces from this Marco van Hylckama does. Not compatible?

author: Tyler David Sherman
comment: As others have said a color customization option would be appreciated, but for a free watch face this is superb.
title: Love the face!

author: Kianvash Ghahari
comment: I have a problem on huawei watch 2, the watch is not in the middle, some part of it is out of the screen

reply.author: Marco van Hylckama Vlieg
reply.content: I purchased a Huawei Watch 2 myself. The new version is fixed and looks good on this watch. Please try it out and let me know if you like it better now!

author: Daniel Zarycki
comment: Favorite watch face I keep going back to, but I want to know where did the customization options go? I can't find an app to open any more to change it.

author: Michael Morrow
comment: This is my favorite watch face for my moto360. Nice work
title: My favorite

author: Luke Kazanis
comment: The best watchface I've found so far!

comment: It's doesn't fit my polar M600 so it's no good for me

comment: It's the best watch face I have ran into.

comment: Great face, thank you

comment: nice, love it

author: Marcin Ramzes
comment: Nice

author: Piotr Chodań
comment: I like the idea even though I suck at reading analogue time. Thanks!
title: Looks good

author: Seyavash Bit
comment: Very nice

author: Kevin Trevorrow
comment: I really like the design and the customization options. The only problem is on my Moto 360 2nd gen the watch face isn't centered.  I'd give this face 5 stars if the face was where it was supposed to be.                     Yay the face is now centered.  Love it.

reply.author: Marco van Hylckama Vlieg
reply.content: Latest version supports the new moto360 watch.

title: Somethings wrong (FIXED)

author: Brian Krohn
comment: Developer responded in a few days time to complaint that face was off-center to let me know it was fixed. Great support, nice looking watch face.
title: Looks good

author: Dan Fontana
comment: The watchface isn't center on the moto 360 2nd gen 42mm! Edit: yay works :) thanks.

reply.author: Marco van Hylckama Vlieg
reply.content: Latest version supports the new moto360 watch.

title: Great watchface but..

author: John Moquin
comment: Love the customization options but a custom color option would be great. Developer is super fast at fixing issues. Especially since it's free.
title: Dope watch face

comment: Very cool watch face and now works wit 2015 42mm moto 360 after update.

reply.author: Marco van Hylckama Vlieg
reply.content: Latest version supports the new moto360 watch.

title: Great watch face

author: Robert Kight
comment: Works great on Moto 360 2nd gen! Very cool watch face.
title: Excellent!

author: Jens Hittenkofer
comment: Look good, more colors and options would be nice, weather too like a pixel cloud or sun. There seems to be a bug which causes some default digital watch to pop up over the pixel one in ambient mode and when this happens the "lit up" watchface get swapped for some (android template? :) image..
title: Like it! Great idea

author: James Barr
comment: Does not support the Huawei watch that has a bigger display. It only shows up in the top left corner

reply.author: Marco van Hylckama Vlieg
reply.content: Latest version supports the Huawei watch.

title: Nice design but poorly implemented

author: Greg Bullock
comment: Fun watch face :) I'd like to see more options like 8-bit weather and battery icons and maybe some way of changing the grid size.  Good job, dev!
title: Does what it says

author: Abel Tapia
comment: Could use a few extra things. Mainly the date and in ambient mode the extra hour marks.
title: Pretty cool idea!

title: New Moto 360

reply.content: Update should no longer ask for Identity permissions.

title: Why new permissions?

comment: Works, does what it says, and it looks "sharp". A little more customization would be nice.
title: Works, and looks good!

comment: Works and looks great on my Moto 360! Very pleased for a free download.
title: Fantastic

reply.content: Update should no longer ask for Identity permissions.

title: Why the permission creep?
